questiontext.text:
Write a statement that creates a variable {=varName1} and assign the value {=val1} to it.

{1:SAC:=int} {1:SAC:=cy} = {1:SAC:=1942} ;

What would the following expressions be evaluated to, in Processing?

  • 2 * 7 / 5 {1:NM:=2~2.8#this is an integer expression}
  • (20 / 8) * 8 {2:NM:=16}
  • 53%10*10 + 53/10 {1:NM:=35}
  • 3 + 8 / 5.0 {1:NM:=4.6:0.0001~2#division before addition, also 5.0 makes it floating-point~2.2#division before addition}
